title: Minecraft 1.5.2 Cracked with Opti-Fine & Mini-Map
description:
This is Minecraft 1.5.2 with the Opti-Fine, and Mini-Map mod installed. 

Please comment after the download, and share this great game from Notch, Jeb & Mojang! Buy their game if you like it!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- To install, first click your start button and search %appdata% This will open the Roaming folder.

(**Optional - Copy your .minecraft folder from %appdata% to your desktop or wherever to reatin your previous version of Spoutcraft. Swap .minecraft folders to change MC versions.**)


- Copy the new .minecraft folder into the Roaming folder opened after typing %apptada%. 

- Open the new .minecraft folder in %appdat%, then run Minecraft.exe, give it a second to load the proper config since it is it's first time running.

- Enter your username in the Username box. If you are using an offline Player Name, there is no need to enter a password.

- Click "Login" and if it says can't connect, click "Play Offline"

-Enjoy & Comment!




Tags: Minecraft, 1.5.2, 1 5 2, cracked, optifine, opti, fine, opti-fine, mini, map, minimap, mini-map
